sledgehammer.plugin

Class MongoModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.plugin.Module
        • sledgehammer.plugin.MongoModule
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModuleChat, ModuleDiscord, ModuleFactions, ModulePermissions

    public abstract class MongoModule
extends Module
    Module class designed to package simple MongoDB operations.
    Author:
    Jab
